description:
Hello team, 

Thanks for this note, kindly add the following features 
1- Dark Mode
2- The possibility to export backup 

KInd, regards

The app's design is great and I would love to use it as my main note-taking app, but it's missing basic features like selecting the text with the mouse or copy-pasting.

At this point it's unusable, but if it implements the basics it'll be a beautifuly designed simple app and would definitely replace what I'm currently using. Hopefully it's actively developped and we won't have to wait too long!
summary: Great design, but not useable yet
